channel.title: Please take this poll and post feedback...I need the results for my MMORPG!
channel.description:
Hello, me and my friend (Krono2020) are making a MMORPG and we are in kind of a binde. We have no idea how many people will join or take interest. We are trying to raise 1000USD (No donations please) and we need to get a good estimate of how many people would take interest so we can plan accordingly. Once the game is up we would also charge a small fee to play or beta test until we could get the game running smoothly. Please take the above poll to let us know if you would join, and also please post how much would be a reosenable price to pay to beta test or play. After we raise enough money we will offer a F2P version of the game though. Please post feedback, and once we get a website up, I will post a link (I will of cource ask Mopar first ;D).
Thank you alot, Akriam
(also if you have any tips or anything feel free to share them)

item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

I’ll sure as hell try and yes we have Direct3D and DirectX my friend bought a book, were not completely retarded you know :)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 09:00:33 PM[/size][hr]And I dont suppose I could have a copy of that engine to see how it was made? Or to expand upon it? If you don’t want to I understand though.

Read full topic
item.source: Please take this poll and post feedback...I need the results for my MMORPG!

item.title: Please take this poll and post feedback...I need the results for my MMORPG!
item.dc:creator: @David David
item.description:
@David wrote:

A MMORPG engine often costs $100,000+.

Why would we pay to play a BETA version of a game? We could pay to play WoW.

You do realise you can’t just code it in C++? You’re gonna need the support of a rendering device, such as OpenGL or DirectX/Direct3D. They’re harder to incorporate/learn than C++.

I made a BASIC MMORPG engine (you can move and object around and other people can join). But it wasn’t supported by OpenGL or Direct3D, as it didn’t use 3D graphics.

No offense, but I doubt this will be made, so please don’t invest in it.

Prove me wrong, I hope you do.

Read full topic
